attributes.action: apologize to the British luxury car workers for the deliberate snubs dished out in recent weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I noticed with total disgust that BRITISH tax payers money was used to provide a GERMAN van (not even a car!) to transport OBhama around London. This country is the home of ROLLS ROYCE, BENTLEY, JAGUAR, DAIMLER and RANGE ROVER. The fact that the government SNUBBED the workers from ALL of these in favour of GERMAN workers at Mercedes is nothing short of totally disgusting.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
